herman-test-project » scale

$text-scale

scss 
$text-scale: (
  'text-ratio': 1.4,
);

Ratio text-ratio (1.4)

Step Value
-3 0.36
 
-2 0.51
 
-1 0.71
 
— base
 
1 1.4
 
2 1.96
 
3 2.74
 

$text-sizes

scss 
$text-sizes: (
  'root': 18px,
  'small': 'root' ('text-ratio': -1),
  'medium': 'root' ('text-ratio': 0.7),
  'caption': 'root',
  'task': 'root' ('text-ratio': -0.125),
  'social': 'root' ('text-ratio': -0.25),
);
